snippet.title: Just Dance 2015 : E3 announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The world's #1 dance game brand is back with Just Dance 2015! This year, the latest edition of the record-breaking franchise is bringing all new moves with breakthrough features and over 40 of the hottest tracks and coolest dances.
All new feature: Community Remix. We put you in the game and players everywhere can dance to you!   

And coming soon: Discover Just Dance Now, a revolutionary new way to play Just Dance, using your smartphone as the controller and playing on any connected screen.

Discover the first hits of the tracklist: www.justdancegame.com/JD2015-tracklist

More information :
http://justdancegame.com
 #JustDance2015 

Join us on Facebook! http://www.facebook.com/JustDanceGame and https://www.facebook.com/Ubisoft.Canada.
